title: Expression to be eligible for camp

content.question: To attend a particular camp, a student must be either at least 13 years old or in grade 9 or higher, but must not yet be 18 years old. Let age represent a student’s age and let grade represent the student’s grade level. Which of the following expressions evaluates to true if the student is eligible to attend the camp and evaluates to false otherwise?

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
